headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Rev Your Engines: 2X GTA$ and RP on Select Stunt Races
content:
Adrenaline is a wonderful thing. Get your heart pumping by jumping over your competition, whether thatâ€™s behind the wheel of a Trophy Truck or jostling for position above the La Puerta Freeway.

Racers can take home 2X GTA$ and RP on all the new Stunt Races released this year, namely: Sun, Sea and Chicanes, A Tight Spot, Bridge Too Far, Cluster Struck, Vicious Spiral, Canyon Fodder, Smoke Up Your Asphalt, and City Limits.
